commandText:
SELECT c.id, c.age, c.childrens_age, c.contact_type, c.discount_for_client, c.economic_standing, c.family_status, c.full_name, c.gender, c.geolocation_of_client_address, c.having_children, c.having_elderly, c.landmark, c.language, c.phone_number, c.social_username, c.street, c.take_into_account, c.type, a.id, a.city, a.client_id, a.geolocation_of_client_address, a.landmark, a.street, c0.id, c0.age, c0.client_id, c0.full_name, c0.gender, c1.id, c1.age, c1.client_id, c1.full_name, c1.gender
FROM clients AS c
LEFT JOIN addresses AS a ON c.id = a.client_id
LEFT JOIN client_childrens AS c0 ON c.id = c0.client_id
LEFT JOIN client_adults AS c1 ON c.id = c1.client_id
ORDER BY c.id, a.id, c0.id

commandText:
SELECT c.id, c.age, c.childrens_age, c.contact_type, c.discount_for_client, c.economic_standing, c.family_status, c.full_name, c.gender, c.geolocation_of_client_address, c.having_children, c.having_elderly, c.landmark, c.language, c.phone_number, c.social_username, c.street, c.take_into_account, c.type, a.id, a.city, a.client_id, a.geolocation_of_client_address, a.landmark, a.street, c0.id, c0.age, c0.client_id, c0.full_name, c0.gender, c1.id, c1.age, c1.client_id, c1.full_name, c1.gender
FROM clients AS c
LEFT JOIN addresses AS a ON c.id = a.client_id
LEFT JOIN client_childrens AS c0 ON c.id = c0.client_id
LEFT JOIN client_adults AS c1 ON c.id = c1.client_id
ORDER BY c.id, a.id, c0.id
